{%set amount = frappe.db.sql("SELECT SUM(amount) as dis FROM `tabInvoice Item` WHERE parent = '"+doc.name+"'", as_dict=1)%} {{amount[0].dis}}

Total GST Payable : {%set gst1 = frappe.db.sql("SELECT gst_value as gst FROM `tabInvoice Item` WHERE parent = '"+doc.name+"'", as_dict=1)%} {{gst1[0].gst}}

Discount
{%set discount = frappe.db.sql("SELECT SUM(discount) as dis FROM `tabInvoice Item` WHERE parent = '"+doc.name+"'", as_dict=1)%} {{discount[0].dis}}
